sentences.en: An overzealous security guard checked inside the baby's bottle.
sentences.cn: 一名过于尽职的保安打开了婴儿的奶瓶来查看。

sentences.en: After pulling out huge blocks of concrete and piles of dirt from the hole, the excavator operator got a little overzealous.
sentences.cn: 从洞里挖出大块的混凝土和成堆的泥土后，挖掘机操作员有点过于热心了。

sentences.en: Another classic trap is alienating your boss with your overzealous self-promotion.
sentences.cn: 另一个典型的困局是：过度的自我推销，因而导致与老板疏远。
